Bring       
to the Intel Edison

Debian
CentOS
Fedora

Bring your favorite distro to the Intel Edison.

There has been only Yocto and closed CentOS and Debian for Intel Edison's OS until now.
Now, we made yet another complete images of Debian CentOS, and Fedora.
Also, Arch linux and Gentoo will be added.

Everything is opened. (coming soon)

you@machine:~/edison-src/out/linux64/$ source poky/oe-init-build-env
you@machine:~/edison-src/out/linux64/build$ bitbake edison-image
you@machine:~/edison-src/out/linux64/build$ cd ../../..
you@machine:~/edison-src$ sudo ./meta-intel-edison/utils/create-centos-image.sh_
We'll publish scripts and instructions to build these images soon.
All sources, patches, and scripts will be opened.
You can build all images we're publishing by following our instructions and scripts.
This means you can custormize all features of your Edison, with your favorite distributions.
